unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore: Your Ticket to That Mumbai Dream!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore: Your Ticket to That Mumbai Dream!**

unnormalised: Hey folks! Dreaming of owning that cozy little 1BHK in Mumbai or that sprawling villa near Bangalore? Well, the good news is home loan schemes are raining offers this season!
normalised: Hey folks! Dreaming of owning that cozy little one B H K in Mumbai or that sprawling villa near Bangalore? Well, the good news is home loan schemes are raining offers this season!

unnormalised: SBI, HDFC, ICICI – all the big players are battling it out with attractive interest rates and flexible repayment options. We're talking rates starting as low as 8.5% for salaried folks. Plus, many banks are waiving processing fees till Diwali (24/10/2024).
normalised: S B I, H D F C, I C I C I – all the big players are battling it out with attractive interest rates and flexible repayment options. We're talking rates starting as low as eight point five percent for salaried folks. Plus, many banks are waiving processing fees till Diwali (twenty fourth October two thousand and twenty four).

unnormalised: Heard Mr. Sharma from my building booked his just yesterday at 11:30 AM! He's been planning this since 15/08/1947 (just kidding, more like last year!).
normalised: Heard Mister Sharma from my building booked his just yesterday at eleven thirty A M! He's been planning this since fifteenth August nineteen forty seven (just kidding, more like last year!).

unnormalised: Don't get stuck in the rental trap, yaar. Do your homework, compare the deals, and get pre-approved. Sites like Magicbricks and NoBroker are a great starting point.
normalised: Don't get stuck in the rental trap, yaar. Do your homework, compare the deals, and get pre-approved. Sites like Magicbricks and NoBroker are a great starting point.

unnormalised: Just remember to factor in stamp duty, registration charges and that all-important "griha pravesh" ceremony expense! Good luck hunting for your dream home! Remember, the offers might end sooner than you think, like 31/12/2024!
normalised: Just remember to factor in stamp duty, registration charges and that all-important "griha pravesh" ceremony expense! Good luck hunting for your dream home! Remember, the offers might end sooner than you think, like thirty first December two thousand and twenty four!
